trustfund:
TF051480-UK-DFID AND WORLD BANK
            PARTNERSHIP FOR INDIA - SASHD

abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the Second
            Reproductive and Child Health Project for India is to expand
            the use of essential reproductive and child health services
            of adequate quality with reduction of geographical
            disparities. The changes include: (i) a reallocation of
            Credit proceeds; (ii) a modification to disbursement
            arrangements related to polio operating costs; (iii) a
            revised results framework; and (iv) an extension of the
            International Development Association (IDA) financing
            closing date by 18 months, i.e. from September 30, 2010 to
            March 31, 2012.
